todos.title: Setup Development Environment
todos.description: Install and configure IDE, Node.js, and a database management system.

todos.title: Learn REST API Basics
todos.description: Understand how to create and consume RESTful APIs.

todos.title: Build a Simple CRUD App
todos.description: Develop a basic full stack application with CRUD operations.

todos.title: Study Authentication Techniques
todos.description: Implement user authentication using JWT and OAuth.

todos.title: Frontend Styling with CSS and Frameworks
todos.description: Practice responsive design using CSS and frameworks like Tailwind or Bootstrap.

todos.title: Backend Development with Express.js
todos.description: Create backend routes and controllers using Express.js.

todos.title: Database Operations
todos.description: Learn to perform CRUD operations with MongoDB or MySQL.

todos.title: Debugging and Error Handling
todos.description: Learn how to debug applications and handle errors gracefully.

todos.title: Version Control with Git
todos.description: Practice creating branches, commits, and pull requests on GitHub.

todos.title: Deploy an Application
todos.description: Deploy a full stack application to Heroku or Vercel.
